ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_negicn | |- -u _i e. CC |
| 2 | 1 | #P_a1i | |- ( A e. CC -> -u _i e. CC ) |
| 3 |  | #P_id | |- ( A e. CC -> A e. CC ) |
| 4 | 2, 3 | #P_mulcld | |- ( A e. CC -> ( -u _i x. A ) e. CC ) |
| 5 |  | #P_absrele | |- ( ( -u _i x. A ) e. CC -> ( abs ` ( Re ` ( -u _i x. A ) ) ) <_ ( abs ` ( -u _i x. A ) ) ) |
| 6 | 4, 5 | #P_syl | |- ( A e. CC -> ( abs ` ( Re ` ( -u _i x. A ) ) ) <_ ( abs ` ( -u _i x. A ) ) ) |
| 7 |  | #P_imre | |- ( A e. CC -> ( Im ` A ) = ( Re ` ( -u _i x. A ) ) ) |
| 8 | 7 | #P_fveq2d | |- ( A e. CC -> ( abs ` ( Im ` A ) ) = ( abs ` ( Re ` ( -u _i x. A ) ) ) ) |
| 9 |  | #P_absmul | |- ( ( -u _i e. CC /\ A e. CC ) -> ( abs ` ( -u _i x. A ) ) = ( ( abs ` -u _i ) x. ( abs ` A ) ) ) |
| 10 | 1, 9 | #P_mpan | |- ( A e. CC -> ( abs ` ( -u _i x. A ) ) = ( ( abs ` -u _i ) x. ( abs ` A ) ) ) |
| 11 |  | #P_ax-icn | |- _i e. CC |
| 12 |  | #P_absneg | |- ( _i e. CC -> ( abs ` -u _i ) = ( abs ` _i ) ) |
| 13 | 11, 12 | #P_ax-mp | |- ( abs ` -u _i ) = ( abs ` _i ) |
| 14 |  | #P_absi | |- ( abs ` _i ) = 1 |
| 15 | 13, 14 | #P_eqtri | |- ( abs ` -u _i ) = 1 |
| 16 | 15 | #P_oveq1i | |- ( ( abs ` -u _i ) x. ( abs ` A ) ) = ( 1 x. ( abs ` A ) ) |
| 17 |  | #P_abscl | |- ( A e. CC -> ( abs ` A ) e. RR ) |
| 18 | 17 | #P_recnd | |- ( A e. CC -> ( abs ` A ) e. CC ) |
| 19 | 18 | #P_mulid2d | |- ( A e. CC -> ( 1 x. ( abs ` A ) ) = ( abs ` A ) ) |
| 20 | 16, 19 | #P_syl5eq | |- ( A e. CC -> ( ( abs ` -u _i ) x. ( abs ` A ) ) = ( abs ` A ) ) |
| 21 | 10, 20 | #P_eqtr2d | |- ( A e. CC -> ( abs ` A ) = ( abs ` ( -u _i x. A ) ) ) |
| 22 | 6, 8, 21 | #P_3brtr4d | |- ( A e. CC -> ( abs ` ( Im ` A ) ) <_ ( abs ` A ) ) |
